A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: *Spoiler free* When it's good it's great. When it failters it does so pretty hard. Lots of twists and turns. An impressive visual treat to be sure\, but some of the plot holes are glaring. Most of the funny parts are great\, but some feel forced and cheesy at times. Still lots of unanswered questions and unusual decisions for characters. Overall a good edition to the Star Wars franchise. I'll be viewing it a second time tonight and we will see how it fairs for repeated viewing.
